posts.post_content:
Flavourfully, this is as hard to equip as a [Batterskull](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Batterskull) or a [Worldslayer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Worldslayer).  
  
As in, a simple bow and arrow takes the same effort to equip to someone as it does to equip a world-destroying greatsword or a giant battering ram that sucks the life out of its targets.   
  
WAT.
